translation.en: [boy in Chinese] I want to become rain, scouring the roof
I want to become a wave And take away the past

translation.en: I want to become fire, burn and purify
But if I can, I want to be myself

translation.en: [boy in English] I'm about to introduce myself.
My name is Yin Yuguo.
I'm 16 years old.
Born and raised in Kunming, China.
I often dream I'm a dragon.
I can go anywhere.
See the world.
Find my true home.

translation.en: I love literature deeply,

translation.en: I'm in grade ten in high school,

translation.en: But most people call those "useless books" because they can't help you with exams.

translation.en: A well-known Polish poetess said,

translation.ko: 글쎄요, 전 시를 읽는 부조리가 더 좋습니다

translation.en: [in Chinese] Forest, why are you so troubled?
There's no wind and there's no rain
translation.ko: "왜 울부짖는가, 숲의 나무여? 미하이 에미네스쿠 지음" '바람도 없고 비도 없다'

translation.ko: 제 품에서 울게 하는 것 말고 해줄 게 없어서 가슴이 아팠어요

translation.en: I'd hold him in my arms and pat his back.

translation.en: but if I can't study abroad, life can't carry on.
translation.ko: 하지만 외국에서 공부할 수 없다면 계속해서 살아갈 수가 없습니다 "인융린 위궈의 아버지"

translation.en: [in Chinese] I hope for four things.
The first is to be able to continue to enrich myself intellectually.

translation.ko: 그래도 늙은 암탉처럼 날개 아래에 그 애를 품어 보호하고 싶었어요

[Yonglin] Going abroad to Romania to study, this was his wish,

So even though in my heart I didn't want him to go so far,

And the winds may heavily blow

I must go

translation.ko: 안녕, 엄마! 바커우에 있는 바실레 알렉산드리 대학이에요 "바실레 알렉산드리 대학교 바커우"

translation.ko: 외국인이 루마니아 문화와 언어만 공부하러 여기 오는 일은 없어요

I'd say, "Don't worry, I can handle it." "No, teacher."
translation.ko: 제가 알아서 하겠다고 하면 이랬죠 '아니에요, 교수님'

translation.en: I actually asked him,
I said, "Sorry to ask,

translation.en: how many million inhabitants does the city you come from have?"
translation.ko: '네가 온 도시는 주민이 몇 백만 명이나 되니?'

translation.en: And when he said it's five times bigger than Bucharest,
translation.ko: 위궈가 부쿠레슈티 인구보다 다섯 배 많다고 대답했을 때

translation.en: I asked, "So why did you come to Bacău? To Romania?"

translation.en: [Yuguo in English] I like the city of Bacău.
translation.ko: 저는 바커우라는 도시가 좋아요 "인위궈의 블로그 게시글"

translation.en: On the weekends, I enjoy going to sleep right before the sunrise

translation.en: and getting up in the mild sunshine of Romanian afternoon.
translation.ko: 루마니아의 부드러운 오후 햇빛을 받으며 일어나고요

translation.en: Wearing a tie,
sleepy eyes.
Trying to end the rise of tiredness with a cup of coffee.
translation.ko: 고개를 드는 피곤함을 커피 한잔으로 달래려고 해요

translation.en: But I must practice more.
[Yuguo in Romanian] What I wish for you, sweet Romania
What I wish for you, sweet Romania
What I wish for you, sweet Romania

he was most attached to that anthem,

translation.en: let's call it that,
"What I Wish for You, Sweet Romania."
[Yuguo] My country of glory The country I long for

Sweet Romania, this I wish for you
[woman] We hosted the National Day of Culture at the Alfa Gallery in Bacău,

translation.ko: 갤러리 문 앞에서 멈추더니 이랬죠 '안녕하세요!' 루마니아어로요

translation.en: What was he up to?
We were amused by him.
I captured this, which was very comical.

translation.ko: 루마니아 전통 모자인 아스트라한 모자를 쓰고 있어요

translation.en: [Băcăoanu] …to celebrate not just our national poet, Mihai Eminescu,
translation.ko: 우리 국민 시인 미하이 에미네스쿠만이 아니라

We were there just to show face.

Good day!
Today, I have Eminescu's
"What I Wish For You, Sweet Romania."

What I wish for you, sweet Romania
My country of glory The country I long for?

translation.ko: 처음 위궈를 봤을 때 우린 헤벌쭉하게 웃었어요

translation.en: But he wowed everyone.

translation.en: Like the night's stars Like the day's dawn
May you live forever Full of glory and joy
[Dănilă] I was watching him, listening to him,

translation.en: and I was convinced
I'm in the presence of an extraordinary being.

translation.en: Um, and now, in Chinese.
[in Chinese] What I wish for you, sweet Romania…

translation.en: He seemed to fit in.

translation.en: [in Chinese] Sweet Romania, this I wish for you
[in Romanian] Thank you!

translation.en: Crows are rarely seen in my hometown.
White, the winter
White, the winter

translation.ko: 밤늦게 눈이 내리면 위궈는 밖으로 나오곤 했죠

I'm often disappointed…

translation.ko: 루마니아가 정말 아름답다는 것을 제게 보여주었어요

translation.en: [man 2] He started coming to our museum, and he was more serious than any of us!
translation.ko: 우리 박물관에 오기 시작했는데 우리 중 누구보다 진지했어요

pure.

translation.en: Yes?
[woman] Why did you come here today?
I love Romanian culture and literature.
Today, I'm here to celebrate with everyone.
Happy birthday, Romania.
I wish Romania and the Romanian people will have a great future.
translation.ko: 루마니아와 루마니아 국민에게 굉장한 미래가 펼쳐지길 바랍니다

translation.en: -[woman] Where are you from? -China. Yes.
[in Romanian] For someone to come from such a faraway place
and talk so beautifully and simply about you…

translation.en: I don't know. That never happens.
[Yuguo in English] People invited me to have traditional Romanian food.

translation.en: They all chatted with me and regarded me as a friend.

translation.en: I was so happy that night.
[Dănilă in Romanian] Here it is. His first published article.

translation.en: The sound of flapping wings is endless.
I feel like the dragon finally found his home.
translation.ko: 용이 마침내 집을 찾은 것 같은 기분이에요

translation.en: I still have a lot to explore, a lot to see and discover.
translation.ko: 아직 탐험할 것, 볼 것 발견할 것이 많아요

translation.en: But I have a lot of time and all my energy, which is limitless.
translation.ko: 하지만 전 시간이 많고 에너지는 무한정 있어요

translation.en: [in Romanian] I met young Yin Yuguo on January 4th, 2019.
He came to visit the museum,
and at the end of the guided tour,
he wanted to write something in the visitor book.
translation.ko: 위궈는 방명록에 뭔가 쓰고 싶어 했어요

translation.en: And because he was so tall, he knelt down.
translation.ko: 키가 무척 큰 젊은이라 바닥에 무릎을 꿇었죠

translation.en: It was an extraordinary moment.
It was like a prayer for the history of the place,
translation.ko: 이곳의 역사를 위해 기도하는 것 같았거든요

translation.en: so I asked if I could take a photo.
Later on, that photograph, unfortunately,
became the one by which the police identified him
translation.ko: 경찰이 인위궈의 신원을 확인하는 용도로 쓰였어요

translation.en: after the tragedy that took place.
On Friday night, he told me he wanted to go visit Neamt Fortress.
translation.ko: 금요일 밤에 네암츠 요새에 가고 싶다고 했어요

translation.en: I asked him not to go. There were weather warnings.
translation.ko: 가지 말라고 부탁했어요 악천후 예고가 있었거든요

translation.en: [Dănilă] But he decided to go. He took the train.
translation.ko: 하지만 위궈는 가기로 했어요 기차를 탔죠

translation.en: And in a station along the way,
the train was stationary for a bit longer than usual.
translation.ko: 기차가 평소보다 더 오래 정차해 있었어요

translation.en: Without any means of information, Yuguo panicked.
translation.ko: 정보를 얻을 길이 없던 위궈는 완전히 당황하고 말았어요

translation.en: He thought that's where he was supposed to get off.
He decided to jump as the train was leaving.
translation.ko: 기차가 움직이기 시작하자 위궈는 뛰어내리기로 했어요

translation.en: He opened the door
and saw a sea of snow,
without knowing that underneath the snow, there was a stone mile marker,
translation.ko: 돌로 된 이정표가 있었지만 눈이 쌓여서 보이지 않았겠죠

translation.en: which he hit his head on.
The end was instantaneous.
[Qing] I remember you were playing in the bathtub when you were small.
translation.ko: 네가 욕조에서 놀던 게 기억나 그때 넌 조그마했지

translation.en: The water splashed everywhere,
and the whole room was filled with your laughter.
You said, "I think the nature of the universe is ashes."
translation.ko: 넌 이렇게 말했지 '우주는 본래 재라고 생각해요'

translation.en: "The Earth is the ashes of the Sun. The Sun is the ashes of the galaxy."
"Everything is ashes."
[Qing] You were five.
[Yonglin] I lost the ability to smile.
If there is indeed a parallel universe,
I hope he's there, pursuing his dreams.
translation.ko: 그 애가 그곳에서 꿈을 좇기를 바랍니다

translation.en: I hope he's healthy and happy in that world,
living the life he wants.
I must learn to be strong.
[Qing] Many asked us if we regret letting him go.
translation.ko: 아이를 보내준 걸 후회하냐고 많은 사람이 물었어요

translation.en: We don't. We don't have regrets.
The biggest wish parents have
is to see their child realize their dreams.
translation.ko: 자식이 꿈을 실현하는 모습을 보는 거예요

translation.en: If we are afraid to follow our dreams, then we can't have anything.
translation.ko: 꿈을 좇는 것을 두려워한다면 아무것도 얻을 수 없어요

translation.en: Bacău is his home.
Because it's in the Carpathian Mountains.
Because he spent 80 incredibly happy days there.
He said, "Mom, I dreamt I was a dragon, flying in the sky."
translation.ko: 위궈가 그랬죠, '엄마, 용이 되어 하늘을 나는 꿈을 꿨어요'

translation.en: "But I died. My heart was stabbed."
"I fell from the sky, and my flesh was given to many people."
translation.ko: '저는 하늘에서 떨어졌고 많은 사람이 제 살을 나눠 가졌죠'

translation.en: He told me the dream made him happy.
